name: Gumb Eats Some Crackers
description:
Gumb   is a funny creature who likes to eat food and other stuff on occasion. Unlike most of us, his digestive system involves micro-organisms breaking down his food through matching various pieces in rows and columns. That's it that's the game, a falling block matching puzzle game where you control a little bacteria thing. Get matches of 3 or more in a row and don't let the crackers touch the top of the screen.

-Grab crackers with Spacebar, Z, Enter, or Shift

-Move around with WASD or arrow keys

-While holding a cracker you can only move to empty spaces and you're also pulled down by gravity

-I don't think pretzels count as crackers but I also don't care
